snippet: A boat carrying 97 people from Indonesia sank off the western coast of Malaysia, and 61 of the passengers were missing, the Malaysian Maritime Enforcement Agency said Wednesday.
abstract: Boat carrying 97 people from Indonesia sinks off the western coast of Malaysia, and 61 of the passengers are missing.
lead_paragraph: A boat carrying 97 people from Indonesia sank off the western coast of Malaysia, and 61 of the passengers were missing, the Malaysian Maritime Enforcement Agency said Wednesday.
